about.description: Quality Assurance Engineer building scalable web applications with modern technologies, clean code, cross collaboration, and Agile methodologies.

experience.title: Quality Assurance Engineer
responsibilities: Tested 8+ scalable web applications using Cypress, Selenium, Postman, and Rest Assured with 40% defect reduction.
Automated API and UI tests, integrated with CI/CD pipelines reducing testing time by 50% and ensuring 99% release quality.
Collaborated in Agile teams using Jira, resolved 100+ production issues.

list.name: Resolution Pro
list.tech: Selenium • Cucumber • Soap UI • Load Runner • Google Workspace
features: Complete automation testing with high regression test on daily builds.
Rapid API testing with detailed test reports and bug logging before releases.
Working with developer to solver the performace issue using Grafana.

list.name: PISL Infra
list.tech: Playwright • Cucumber • Rest Assured • Grafana • ZOHO Workspace
features: Complete automation and manual testing of web application and APIs.
Performance testing using Grafana and JMeter to identify and resolve bottlenecks.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure quality and timely delivery of features.

philosophy: I maintain consistent high performance through a disciplined balance of focused work, continuous learning, fitness, and rest as a Quality Assurance Engineer.
